mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info ( username, password, phone, birthday, position, role, classes, section, line, support_position, party, member, department ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{position}, #{role}, #{classes}, #{section}, #{line}, #{support_position}, #{party}, #{member}, #{department} )
INSERT INTO user_department ( user_id, department_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{departmentId} )
mapper.select: SELECT classes FROM user_info WHERE id = #{userId}
